testing_tools: Burp Suite, OWASP ZAP, Manual Review
test_scenarios: ["Broken Access Control (IDOR)","Session Hijacking via token leakage","MFA Bypass","Password Reset Poisoning","User Enumeration"]
responsible_team: Third-party Security Vendor, Internal Security Lead
reporting_requirements: Detailed penetration test report with PoC; Remediation plan.
trend_analysis: Track number and severity of findings over time.

test_scenarios: ["Verify permanent deletion E2E flow (TEST-GDPR-001)","Verify profile visibility rules (TEST-SEC-005)","Verify data export functionality provides all user data."]
acceptance_criteria: All data is verifiably removed/anonymized. Privacy settings are enforced server-side.
reporting_requirements: Test execution report confirming data removal.

test_frequency: Every PR Merge (SAST/SCA), Weekly on Staging (DAST)
test_scenarios: ["Check for known vulnerabilities in dependencies","Scan for common coding flaws (e.g., injection, XSS)","Scan running application for misconfigurations."]
acceptance_criteria: No new 'High' or 'Critical' vulnerabilities are introduced into the main branch.
trend_analysis: Number of open vulnerabilities by severity over time.
